mapper.select: select sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '01' then 1 end,0)) "1", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '02' then 1 end,0)) "2", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '03' then 1 end,0)) "3", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '04' then 1 end,0)) "4", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '05' then 1 end,0)) "5", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '06' then 1 end,0)) "6", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '07' then 1 end,0)) "7", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '08' then 1 end,0)) "8", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '09' then 1 end,0)) "9", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '10' then 1 end,0)) "10", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '11' then 1 end,0)) "11", sum(nvl(case when EXTRACT(MONTH FROM regi_date)= '12' then 1 end,0)) "12" from users_register where EXTRACT(YEAR FROM regi_date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)
